name: Véronique Lacroix
what_you_do: We're a Software-as-a-Service technology company that has built and deployed a range of solutions for both private and public sector customers, specializing in innovative digital solutions for civic engagement and operational efficiency.
who_you_serve: We serve municipalities, elected officials, and public sector agencies.
business_focus: Providing digital solutions to improve communication, streamline service delivery, and enhance the management of municipal operations and fleet activities.
